channel.title: PvP Crash
channel.description: Hey guys. I am using a Delta Based 317 server. If you're going to tell me not to use delta please don't bother. Regular PvM combat works just fine, however when entering the wilderness and attacking another player, the client crashes. The server continues to run, and shows that the two clients have disconnected. If anyone could point me in the direction of where I should start looking to fix this problem I would greatly appreciate it.

item.title: PvP Crash
item.dc:creator: @thegraycowl thegraycowl
item.description:
@thegraycowl wrote:

            int i = PlayerHandler.players[c.followID].absX;

EDIT: Is it because there are spaces instead of Tabs?

EDIT2:I tabbed the whole followhandler, now I get this error
java.lang.NullPointerException
at server.PlayerActions.FollowHandler.followDirection(FollowHandler.java
:22)
at server.client.process(client.java:6651)
at server.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271)
at server.process.run(process.java:25)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
